      • quoteParams

      • convertPrameter

        public static java.lang.String convertPrameter(java.lang.String s)
        This method will convert gherkin parameter to qaf parameter. Examples:
        a "<param.a1>" and <another> p<a>ra${meter} and \<param.a2> again
        will be converted to :
        a "${param.a1}" and ${another} p${a}ra${meter} and <param.a2> again

        a "<param.a1>" and <another> p<a>ra${meter} and \\<\<param.a2> again
        will be converted to :
        a "${param.a1}" and ${another} p${a}ra${meter} and \<<param.a2> again
        Parameters:
        s -
        Returns:
